articles.content:
Connor Joe understands if you think of his time as a Giant as forgettable.
It lasted only eight games. It amounted to one hit in 16 plate appearances. He was the surprise starting left fielder on Op… [+11789 chars]

articles.author: Greg Wyshynski
articles.title: Colorado Avalanche overwhelm Nashville Predators to clinch sweep - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: The Avalanche clinched their first-round Western Conference series against the Predators with a 5-3 win in Game 4.
articles.content:
Before the Colorado Avalanche entered the postseason, Calgary Flames head coach Darryl Sutter infamously predicted that a first-round series against them would be "a waste of eight days."
